eFlareon_brain.label: Brain
eFlareon_brain.metadata: Yeah, it's a briain. Fire brain.

eFlareon_ear.label: Ear
eFlareon_ear.metadata: Do I hear a fire stone?

eJolteon_tail.label: Tail
eJolteon_tail.metadata: But it's the feet that are quick.

eJolteon_ear.label: Ear
eJolteon_ear.metadata: Nobody should have such an ear... Volt Absorb!

eVaporeon_brain.label: Brain
eVaporeon_brain.metadata: Brain isn't what I expected. Watery brain.

eVaporeon_tail.label: Tail
eVaporeon_tail.metadata: That tail is for swimming! Water Absorb!

eVaporeon_ear.label: Ear
eVaporeon_ear.metadata: Why have ears if you live underwater? Hydration!
